data.title: Catalonia Hotels & Resorts
data.meta_description: Top offers on city hotels &amp; vacation stays in Europe, America and Caribbean. Book best price online with Catalonia Hotels &amp; Resorts
data.text:
why go?

Put the city at your feet with Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza and stay at Plaza España, one of the epicentres of the Catalan capital. Enjoy the stunning views from your room or visit the rooftop for a panoramic view from the pool. We invite you to explore the new Simultáneo, a place open to everyone where leisure, fine food and culture converge. Succumb to our tempting culinary offering: the tapas in the Gastrobar, the Mediterranean cuisine of the Filigrana restaurant or the striking Japanese fusion dishes at Kurai. We also have 11 meeting rooms equipped for all kinds of events, our own car park, a gym and free wifi. Catalonia Barcelona Plaza is your downtown hotel , with a superb location close to the Fira de Barcelona trade show grounds, the Fuentes Mágicas fountains and the Montjuïc mountain.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza hotel is located in an emblematic building in Plaza España, whose clock on the main façade is an icon of the city. Upon entering you will discover a renovated, spacious lobby, from where you can access the Simultáneo space, the new place-to-be in Barcelona. A large open room with a glass roof and an atmosphere that is as bright as it is welcoming, thanks to the jungle-inspired design in shades of green, orange and ivory. In Simultáneo, gastronomy, leisure and culture merge in a versatile place where we are waiting for you whether you are staying at the hotel or not. Come telework connected to the free WIFI, have an informal meeting, enjoy a concert, have an after-work cocktail or simply treat yourself to a break before continuing with your day. If you feel like eating while you are at Simultáneo, the Gastrobar offers an extensive menu with innovative tapas and haute cuisine dishes that you will surely want to try. The gastronomic experience continues in the other two hotel restaurants. At Filigrana you will find an extensive menu inspired by Mediterranean cuisine in an elegant setting. Choose between rice dishes, grilled meats, fish from the market and Catalan culinary specialties. On the other hand, if you are looking for a different proposal, the Kurai restaurant will transport you to Japan with unique dishes halfway between Japanese and Western cuisine. In addition to a large selection of sushi, it has a wok, sumi-yaki (grilled) and a Japanese cocktail menu. In summer, contemplate the best panoramic views of Barcelona from The Clock Terrace, our designer rooftop with a pool, Balinese beds and a chill out area. Nothing better than some tapas accompanied by a glass of wine or a cocktail to relax admiring the bustle of the city. If you stay to get to know the city, the Catalonia Barcelona Plaza hotel is very close to some of the most important tourist spots, as well as being very well connected to the center of Barcelona, via metro and bus. Plaza España is directly opposite, followed by Avenida Maria Cristina, with its imposing Roman towers. The Magic Fountains of Montjuïc begin here, which are illuminated every night with water and color shows. Presiding over the mountain you will find the Palau Nacional, home to the National Art Museum of Catalonia, and, next to the hotel, the Las Arenas shopping center, an old bullring that preserves its exterior architecture. If you come for business, you will be in the ideal location, in a hotel near Fira de Barcelona, located a few meters away, and well connected to the Gran Vía fairgrounds. In addition, we offer you 3 large-capacity conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, so you can celebrate corporate events with all the necessary equipment and parking in the building. If you want to keep fit during your stay, you can use the gym for free or relax in our beauty and aesthetics center with sauna, treatments and massages. Hotel Barcelona-003967

More details Fewer details

why go?

Take in the gorgeous views over La Concha beach from the Catalonia Donosti, located on the natural lookout of San Bartolomé hill. The hotel is set in a former convent and preserves its main facade of great historical value. You won't want to leave therooftop with a terrace, pool and sun deck from where you can admire the best panoramic view over San Sebastián and the Cantabrian Sea. Stay in a boutique hotel with an English-inspired décor. Enjoy Basque cuisine at the Aldapeta Gastrobar, where you can dine on charcoal-grilled steak or drink fine wine. Relax in our wellness zone and plan your celebrations or work events in one of our 5 events rooms. We also have our own car park for cars and bicycles.

Did you know that the Catalonia Donosti hotel is built on an old convent from the 17th and 18th centuries? We have maintained the spectacular north façade, which preserves the bell tower with its two towers and the central body of the church with restored masonry. The building and all the elements that are preserved have a high historical value and are protected by the Urban Heritage of San Sebastián. The façade of the old convent contrasts with the main entrance of the hotel, newly built and with a modern design, creating a stylistic opposition that will surprise you. Upon entering, you will be invaded by a feeling of warmth thanks to the elegant atmosphere achieved with an English-inspired and stately decoration, with noble materials and fabrics such as velvet, marble, copper, dark wood and decorative elements of local origin. If there is something you cannot miss at the Catalonia Donosti hotel, it is the incredible views from the panoramic roof terrace over La Concha beach, the Cathedral and the city centre. In addition, on hot days, you can enjoy a refreshing swim in our urban pool and solarium with sun loungers. On the other hand, on the viewing terrace you will find tables and armchairs to relax admiring the views and, during the summer months, you can have a cocktail, a glass of wine or reserve it for your private events. Enjoy Basque gastronomy in its avant-garde version and with touches of Catalan cuisine at the Aldapeta Gastrobar. A tribute to the culinary tradition of the Basque Country that prioritizes the highest quality local ingredients. Delight your palate with the grilled monkfish with fried mussels or the suckling pig shoulder in its juice with Idiazábal cloud. For a more informal meal, the bar area offers its own menu of dishes, such as steak tartar brioche, txuleta hamburger or Iberian ham croquettes, as well as cocktails and wines. Discover a world of sensations in our wellness space, which has more than 350 m2 to achieve total relaxation. Enjoy the pool with jets, the Finnish sauna, the steam bath, the cold water pool or treat yourself to a massage in our cabins. To continue taking care of your body, in our gym you will find the latest technology in weight-training equipment and cardio machines. The Catalonia Donosti hotel is also the perfect setting for both business and family events. We offer you 5 meeting rooms, some of them with natural light and all equipped with the latest generation audiovisual gadgets. The largest, perfect for corporate conferences, are the Santa Clara room, with partitions and a capacity of up to 180 people, and the San Bartolomé room, which can accommodate up to 140 attendees in its open format. The rest of the smaller rooms are ideal for family celebrations such as birthdays, communions or meals on holidays. In addition, we have our own parking in the same building with a charging point for electric cars (rates to consult with reception via email or phone) and parking for bicycles. Donosti is a lively city with a great cultural scene, which is why our hotel is a great option to stay during the San Sebastian International Film Festival. If you come for tourism, remember to visit the three beaches in the city, or four if we count the one on the Island of Santa Clara, the most famous being Playa de la Concha. Don't miss the San Telmo Museum, dedicated to Basque society, the Aquarium, one of the most important in Europe, the Buen Pastor Cathedral, just two minutes from the hotel, or the famous Chillida Comb of the Winds. Whether for business or pleasure, Catalonia Donosti is your hotel in San Sebastián!

More details Fewer details

why go?

Be amazed by the sensational facilities at the Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spa hotel, located on one of the top beaches in northern Cancun, opposite the famous Isla Mujeres. An all-inclusive resort featuring modern suites with a terrace or balcony and services that will make you want to stay on holidays year-round in paradise. The heart of the resort is Quinta Avenida, where you will find buffet and themed restaurants, bars, food courts, stores and day and night activities. Two large pools with a swim-up bar are waiting to refresh you with a cocktail, and you will enjoy a gourmet Catalan cuisine experience at the Memories restaurant. The whole family will love our leisure activities, especially the kids, both in the children’s pool and at the Kids’ and Teens’ Club. Put the finishing touch on your holiday at the Alegría Spa, with a sauna, Turkish bath, jacuzzi and amazing infinity pool with ocean views. We are waiting for you to enjoy the incredible Mexican Caribbean.

The Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spa hotel has been recognized with the 4 Diamond certification from the American Automobile Association, which distinguishes its elegant design, superior category amenities, as well as a high level of service and attention to detail for an incomparable experience. Upon your arrival you will be greeted by the grandiose lobby surrounded by a beautiful lake and, when you cross it, you will find the backbone of the resort, our Quinta Avenida, inspired by the popular artery of the same name in Playa del Carmen. On this vibrant promenade, always full of life, you will find food courts, bars, shops and even a minimarket. We have international food, Mexican specialties at the Adelita restaurant, Italian dishes at La Toscana, Peruvian fusion at Siwichi, Asian food at the Tao-Cat restaurant or a delicious hamburger at Catalonia Burgers, among others. Try them all on the terraces or in the food courts, ideal for meeting with family or friends for lunch and dinner. At the Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spa you can also taste Catalan food in the heart of the Caribbean, such as the typical coques de recapte at BO Barcelona Origins, or delight yourself with traditional Catalan cuisine in its most gourmet version at the elegant restaurant Memories ( with extra cost). If you are a Privileged client you will have exclusive access to the Bloved restaurant, located on the beachfront, with sea views and à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner options. You can also access the private beach only for Privileged guests where the Pure Bar is located, with a chill out area on the sand. In addition to other advantages such as discounts in our boutiques, extra services such as massages at the Alegría Spa or early check-in and late check-out (depending on availability). To enjoy all these benefits, all you have to do is book one of our Privileged rooms, all of them in the suite category and with a contemporary design that will fascinate you, such as the Privileged suite terrace. If you come as a family, we have four different types of family rooms, one of them with its own pool on the private terrace to spend the best holidays together. In addition to lying in the Caribbean sun on the beach, at the resort you can cool off in our two large pools, one designed for you to relax with cocktails from Margarita's Bar and another that offers a wide variety of activities and fun for the whole family , with an area specially created for the little ones. Eat an authentic Catalan sausage in the Mexican Riviera Maya? At Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spa it is possible! As well as crepes, tropical juices and a wide variety of sweet and savory snacks served throughout the day in our food trucks and bars on the beach and pool. Our resort also has a fantastic entertainment team that organizes all kinds of entertainment for you to have fun during the day and night with dance classes, sports tournaments, pool activities, a gym with a spinning room, etc. In addition, children and adolescents will have a great time in our Kid's Club and Teen's Club with workshops and video games. At night, come and dance at our Cat's Night Club and attend the live performances at our Theatre. Do not lose sight of the ocean for even a second while you relax in the Alegría Spa, where you will find a spectacular outdoor heated infinity pool from which you can contemplate the Caribbean Sea. In addition to a water circuit, sauna, Turkish bath, jacuzzi and a wide variety of massages, body treatments and beauty rituals. The beaches of the Mexican Riviera Maya are famous for hosting thousands of weddings every year, will yours be the next? Come get married at the Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spa in an idyllic setting with your feet in the sand under our special gazebo for weddings. We will organize everything so that you remember this day for the rest of your life. Stay to enjoy an incomparable honeymoon in one of our Privileged Romance Deluxe rooms and don't miss out on everything the Yucatan Peninsula has to offer. From sailing to the nearby Isla Mujeres and Isla Holbox to discovering one of the wonders of the world, the archaeological site of Chichén Itzá, where the famous temple dedicated to the serpent god Kukulcán stands.

More details Fewer details

why go?

Bathe in the crystal-clear waters of the fabulous Punta Maroma beach which lends its name to the Catalonia Playa Maroma hotel. An all-inclusive resort just a 30-minute drive from Cancun international airport and from where you can visit the Mayan pyramids of Chichen Itza and Coba, among other wonders. Perfect for a fantastic holiday in the Mexican Caribbean with your family, partner or friends. Over 400 rooms await in a complex surrounded by nature with a large central pool to sunbathe beside with a cocktail to hand. Enjoy the day and night entertainment for all ages, with the Kid’s Club for children. Have a well-earned indulgence in the form of an open-air massage, choose where you want to eat each day and, if you book a Privileged room, get a host of exclusive advantages. The Catalonia Playa Maroma resort is waiting for you to enjoy the Caribbean like never before!

The hotel is located on Playa Maroma itself, considered one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. It is characterized by its soft white sand naturally mixed with a thin layer of coral pink. Thanks to this, it does not burn too much when you step on it and will allow you to take long walks by the sea. Our more than 400 rooms are designed with the greatest comfort so that you can spend an unforgettable vacation. By reserving one of the Privileged rooms you will have great advantages that will make your stay even better, such as exclusive access to the Bloved restaurant, with views of the sea and a fresh menu that combines dishes inspired by different parts of the world, among many other benefits. Undoubtedly, the most extraordinary of our rooms is the Privileged ocean view & swimming pool suite, with a private pool on the terrace and a huge bathroom with a designer independent bathtub. Let yourself be surprised by the wide gastronomic offer of the Catalonia Playa Maroma hotel for breakfast, lunch and dinner. At the El Pajarito buffet you won't know what to choose between its variety of international and Mexican dishes and its pizzas cooked in a wood-fired oven. During the day, have a snack in our food trucks, one with Catalan sausage sandwiches and another with fish tacos, ideal for snacks between meals. Although, if you prefer, you can also enjoy a coffee accompanied by something sweet in the Aromes Coffee & Lounge or your favorite drink in the pool's aquatic bar, which you will swim to without having to get out of the water. After spending the day enjoying the sun, the sea and the pool, our themed à la carte restaurants await you for dinner. If you are passionate about oriental food, the Ayami restaurant is your best option, if you prefer Italian cuisine, La Toscana awaits you with the best pasta, if you are looking for authentic local food, you will find it in Adelita and if meat is your thing, in the Grill we serve it cooked on the grill. If you want to live a unique culinary experience accompanied by a great acrobatic show, the Rauxa Restaurant & Show awaits you at the neighboring Catalonia Royal Tulum hotel, where you will enjoy a special price as a guest of Catalonia. Is there anything better than relaxing with a cocktail in front of the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea? One of our outdoor massages! Come to the palapa on the beach and you can disconnect with a massage while the Caribbean breeze sways you. In addition, at the Alegría Spa we have a sauna, jacuzzi and Turkish bath for a complete relaxation session. At the Catalonia Playa Maroma resort, the fun doesn't stop throughout the day with sports activities such as archery, beach soccer, initiation to diving, dance classes, tennis courts, a gym and much more. If you travel with your family, the little ones will have a program designed especially for them in our Kid's Club. When night falls, it's time to gather to enjoy live shows in our theater, the weekly pool party or dance until dawn at Cat's Night Club. Punta Maroma Beach is an idyllic place, perfect for celebrating the most important day of your life. Our events team will take care of all the details so that your wedding goes as you wish, with a ceremony on the same sand and a wide variety of gastronomic proposals to please your guests. Surrounded by amazing native mangroves of the Yucatan jungle, at the Catalonia Playa Maroma hotel you will spend spectacular vacations during which you will also be able to learn more about the exciting Mexican history. For example, visiting the ruins of Tulum, the archaeological site of Chichén Itzá, the pyramid of Cobá or the Island of Cozumel, the third largest in the entire country.

More details Fewer details

why go?

Move to the beat of the capital at the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid, a stone's throw from Plaza Cibeles, Puerta del Sol and the Prado Museum. This charming hotel is set in an early twentieth-century building, boasts a stunning carved stone facade and features a gastronomic offering that will thrill your senses. Cool off with a dip in the rooftop pool while you take in the crowds along Gran Vía. Surprise your taste buds at the Bloved restaurant, with innovative dishes made from quality local ingredients. And check out the Bloved Veggie Corner, ideal for vegetarian and vegan patrons. After an incredible culinary experience, stay on to enjoy the live performances at our Gastrobar nnueve 9 Madrid or organise your next event in one of our 4 meeting rooms. We’ll be waiting!

Did you know that the building that houses the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid hotel dates from the beginning of the 20th century? In fact, it is one of the most characteristic of this artery of the city due to its sober Spanish regionalist style, in which the carved stone façade with murals of Talavera tiles and ironwork on the balconies stands out. In order to accommodate the facilities of a hotel and offer you the greatest comfort, we carry out expansion works, adding the adjoining block. In addition, the façade has been completely restored and, upon entering, you will be surprised by the reception, classical in essence, but with a modern design. Choose from the more than 180 rooms at the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid hotel, all of them renovated and warmly decorated in wood and beige tones that invite you to relax and relax. Some stand out for their terraces with views of the Gran Vía, others for having their own private outdoor Jacuzzi. Our spectacular terrace suite with jacuzzi deserves a special mention, which has a separate living room and bedroom and a luxurious view over the city. Indulge your more foodie side without leaving the hotel at the Bloved restaurant, where the passion for gastronomy merges with the best local products. Delight yourself with our chef's innovative dishes, which value the raw materials of the land, such as suckling pig or the tail of everything. If you are a lover of vegetarian and vegan food, your place is the Bloved Veggie Corner, where you will find seasonal options that will surprise you, such as tomato and olive tartare. In addition, our modern Gastrobar nnueve 9 Madrid awaits you with live performances. An informal space with a terrace where you can taste tapas, small plates and appetizers accompanied by a cocktail or a glass of wine. Bathe with the Gran Vía at your feet in the outdoor pool on our rooftop, get fit in the fitness area, free for all hotel guests, or treat yourself to a moment of relaxation with one of our massages and beauty treatments. Do you have an event coming up? Celebrate it in the most central area of Madrid, since at the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid hotel we have 4 rooms that can host all kinds of events, from corporate conferences for companies to family celebrations. All of them are equipped with the latest technology and, as in the rest of the hotel, have free Wi-Fi connection. The proximity to the Prado Museum is the hotel's best claim, since it is located in the well-known Art Triangle, therefore, it is also close to the Thyssen Gallery and the Reina Sofía Museum. In addition to seeing some of the most important artistic works in the country, from the hotel you can also visit other essential places in Madrid, such as Puerta del Sol, Plaza Cibeles, Retiro Park or Puerta de Alcalá. At the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid hotel you will have the city at your fingertips!
